mapper.select: SELECT a.attendance_idx, e.emp_name, a.emp_no, a.att_time, a.leave_time, a.att_result, a.work_day FROM attendance a JOIN employee e ON a.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE a.attendance_idx = #{attendance_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance_management (attendance_management, att_applicant, att_previous_attresult, att_modify_attresult, att_reason) VALUES (#{attendance_management},${att_applicant},#{att_previous_attresult},#{att_modify_attresult},#{att_reason})
mapper.select: SELECT att_management_idx, att_applicant_date, att_apply_status FROM attendance_management WHERE att_applicant = #{param3} ORDER BY att_management_idx DESC LIMIT #{param2}, 10
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(att_management_idx) / #{param1}) AS pages FROM attendance_management WHERE att_applicant = #{param2}

SELECT a.att_applicant, e.emp_name, at.work_day, at.att_time, at.leave_time, a.att_previous_attresult, a.att_modify_attresult, a.att_reason, a.att_modify_reject, a.att_modifier, a.att_modify_date FROM attendance_management a JOIN employee e ON a.att_applicant = e.emp_no JOIN attendance at ON a.attendance_management = at.attendance_idx WHERE a.att_management_idx = #{att_management_idx}

SELECT e.emp_no, e.emp_name, t.title_name, d.dept_name, a.att_time, a.leave_time, a.att_result, a.work_day FROM attendance a JOIN employee e ON a.emp_no = e.emp_no JOIN title t ON e.title_no = t.title_no JOIN department d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no
AND a.work_day = #{filterAttDate}
AND a.att_result = #{filterAttResult}
AND e.emp_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND e.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND t.title_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND d.dept_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')

SELECT COUNT(a.attendance_idx) FROM attendance a JOIN employee e ON a.emp_no = e.emp_no JOIN department d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no JOIN title t ON e.title_no = t.title_no
a.work_day = #{filterAttDate}
AND a.att_result = #{filterAttResult}
AND e.emp_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND e.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND t.title_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND d.dept_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee e WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM attendance a WHERE a.emp_no = e.emp_no AND a.work_day = #{filterAttDate} )) AS absentCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance a JOIN employee e ON a.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE a.att_time >= CONCAT(#{filterAttDate}, ' 09:00:00') AND a.work_day = #{filterAttDate} ) AS lateCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance a JOIN employee e ON a.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE (a.att_result LIKE '%연차%' OR a.att_result LIKE '%반차%') AND a.work_day = #{filterAttDate} ) AS leaveCount

SELECT a.att_management_idx, a.att_applicant_date, a.att_apply_status, e.emp_name, CASE WHEN a.att_modifier IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END AS process_status FROM attendance_management a JOIN employee e ON e.emp_no = a.att_applicant LEFT JOIN title t ON e.title_no = t.title_no LEFT JOIN department d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no
AND DATE(a.att_applicant_date) = #{filterEditDate}
AND a.att_modifier IS NOT NULL
AND a.att_modifier IS NULL
AND a.att_apply_status = true
AND a.att_apply_status = false
AND e.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchEditText}, '%')

SELECT COUNT(a.att_management_idx) AS count FROM attendance_management a JOIN employee e ON e.emp_no = a.att_applicant LEFT JOIN title t ON e.title_no = t.title_no LEFT JOIN department d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no
AND DATE(a.att_applicant_date) = #{filterEditDate}
AND a.att_modifier IS NOT NULL
AND a.att_modifier IS NULL
AND a.att_apply_status = true
AND a.att_apply_status = false
AND e.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchEditText}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance_management SET att_modifier = #{att_modifier}, att_modify_reject = #{att_modify_reject}, att_apply_status = #{att_apply_status}, att_modify_date = NOW() WHERE att_management_idx = #{att_management_idx}

UPDATE attendance_management am JOIN attendance a ON am.attendance_management = a.attendance_idx SET am.att_modifier = #{att_modifier}, am.att_apply_status = #{att_apply_status}, am.att_modify_date = NOW(), a.att_result = '근무' WHERE am.att_management_idx = #{att_management_idx}

UPDATE attendance SET att_result =
att_result = '지각',
att_result = '근무',
att_result = '무단 조퇴',
WHERE work_day = CURRENT_DATE AND att_result IS NULL AND emp_no IN ( SELECT emp_no FROM employee WHERE emp_employment_status = true)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance (emp_no, att_time, leave_time, att_result, work_day) SELECT e.emp_no, NULL, NULL, '결근', CURRENT_DATE FROM employee e LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.emp_no = a.emp_no AND a.work_day = CURRENT_DATE WHERE a.emp_no IS NULL AND e.emp_employment_status = true
